mapper.sql: select id, enable, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark, sort, active_id, user_id, content from active_comment
mapper.select: select ac.id,ac.active_id as "activeId",ac.user_id as "userId",ac.content,au.nickname,au.avatar,ac.img,DATE_FORMAT(ac.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as "createTime" from active_comment ac LEFT JOIN all_user au ON ac.user_id = au.id where ac.enable = 1 and ac.active_id = #{activeId} ORDER BY ac.create_time DESC

select ac.id,ac.active_id as "activeId",ac.user_id as "userId",ac.content,au.nickname,au.avatar,DATE_FORMAT(ac.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as "createTime",ac.img from active_comment ac LEFT JOIN all_user au ON ac.user_id = au.id where ac.enable = 1 and ac.active_id = #{activeId} ORDER BY ac.create_time DESC limit 0,3
